title: Anchored
description: A heartfelt story that reveals the best and worst of people. Childhood best friends, a handsome stranger, and a Rottweiler dog all play the most unusual roles in this journey of discovery and awareness for the main character. In a beautiful seaside town normally known for its peaceful routine, an unexpected meeting by Mia changes everything, for everyone. A flood of lies, abuse, and betrayal threaten romances and relationships. Regrets turn to anger and there is no turning back. Take the journey with these amazing characters and discover their incredible bravery and faith as they confront issues that no one should ever have to face.
author: Tracey Hoffmann
